content: Hi Compiler Team! I'm with This Week in Rust and was looking to include the latest Inside Rust blog post from you guys. I'm not sure if it's been pointed out, but the title says "April Steering Cycle" while the URL and blog post body indicate that it should be "June Steering Cycle" :)
Thanks for the heads up, I posted a fix here: https://github.com/rust-lang/blog.rust-lang.org/pull/857
thanks @Eric Huss , you caught me cut-and-pasting!
